text: Entity ID: ship:MyVessel. @type: ship:Ship. iceClass: IA. ship:serviceSpeed: value: 0; unitRef: unit:Knot. hasSystem: hull:HullSystem1, prop:PropulsionSystem1.

Entity ID: hull:HullSystem1. @type: hull:HullStructureSystem. hasComponent: hull:ShipHullStructure1, hull:Superstructure1, hull:FoundationsAndChocks1, hull:CoatingsAndCathodicProtection1, hull:Markings1.

Entity ID: hull:HullParams1. @type: hull:HullDesignParameters. reg:L: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:LBOW: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:LPAR: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:B: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:T: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:UIWL: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:LIWL: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:Awf: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M2. reg:alpha: value: 0; unitRef: unit:DEG. reg:phi1: value: 0; unitRef: unit:DEG. reg:phi2: value: 0; unitRef: unit:DEG. reg:psi: value: 0; unitRef: unit:DEG. reg:DP: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:HM: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:HF: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:delta: value: 0; unitRef: unit:Tonne.

Entity ID: hull:ShipHullStructure1. @type: hull:ShipHullStructure. hasComponent: hull:Keel1, hull:BottomStructure1, hull:SideStructure1, hull:DeckStructure1, hull:Bulkheads1, hull:Bow1, hull:Stern1. hasDesignParameters: hull:HullParams1.
Entity ID: hull:Keel1. @type: hull:Keel.
Entity ID: hull:BottomStructure1. @type: hull:BottomStructure. hasComponent: hull:InnerBottom1, hull:BottomPlating1, hull:Floors1, hull:Longitudinals1, hull:Girders1.
Entity ID: hull:InnerBottom1. @type: hull:InnerBottom.
Entity ID: hull:BottomPlating1. @type: hull:BottomPlating.
Entity ID: hull:Floors1. @type: hull:Floors.
Entity ID: hull:Longitudinals1. @type: hull:Longitudinals.
Entity ID: hull:Girders1. @type: hull:Girders.
Entity ID: hull:DeckStructure1. @type: hull:DeckStructure. hasComponent: hull:Deck1, hull:UpperDecks1, hull:DeckGirders1, hull:Beams1.
Entity ID: hull:Deck1. @type: hull:Deck. hull:deckThickness: value: 0; unitRef: unit:MM. hasMaterial: steel. locatedInHullRegion: Midbody. isAttachedTo: hull:TransverseFrame101.
Entity ID: hull:UpperDecks1. @type: hull:UpperDecks.
Entity ID: hull:DeckGirders1. @type: hull:DeckGirders.
Entity ID: hull:Beams1. @type: hull:Beams.
Entity ID: hull:Bulkheads1. @type: hull:Bulkheads. hasComponent: hull:BulkheadTrans1, hull:BulkheadLong1, hull:WatertightDoors1.

Entity ID: hull:BulkheadTrans1. @type: hull:Bulkhead. rel:hasOrientation: hull:Orientation/transverse. hull:spacing: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:thickness: value: 0; unitRef: unit:MM. locatedInHullRegion: hull:Region/Midbody.

Entity ID: hull:BulkheadLong1. @type: hull:Bulkhead. rel:hasOrientation: hull:Orientation/longitudinal. hull:spacing: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:thickness: value: 0; unitRef: unit:MM. locatedInHullRegion: hull:Region/Midbody.
Entity ID: hull:WatertightDoors1. @type: hull:WatertightDoors.

Entity ID: hull:SideStructure1. @type: hull:SideStructure. hasComponent: hull:SidePlate1, hull:FramesGroup1, hull:WebFrame1, hull:Stringers1, hull:IceStringer1. locatedInHullRegion: hull:Region/Midbody.

Entity ID: hull:SidePlate1. @type: hull:SidePlate. hull:thickness: value: 0; unitRef: unit:MM. hull:iceBeltVerticalExtentTop: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:iceBeltVerticalExtentBottom: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hasMaterial: steel. locatedInHullRegion: hull:Region/Bow.
Entity ID: hull:SideStiffening1. @type: hull:SideStiffening. hasComponent: hull:TransverseFrame101, hull:LongitudinalFrame201, hull:WebFrame1, hull:IceStringer1.
Entity ID: hull:FramesGroup1. @type: hull:Frames. hasComponent: hull:TransverseFrame101, hull:LongitudinalFrame201.

Entity ID: hull:TransverseFrame101. @type: hull:Frames. rel:hasOrientation: hull:Orientation/transverse. rel:hasSupportType: hull:SupportType/webFrame. hull:span: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:spacing: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:sectionModulusZ: value: 0; unitRef: unit:CM3. hull:shearAreaA: value: 0; unitRef: unit:CM2.

Entity ID: hull:LongitudinalFrame201. @type: hull:Frames. rel:hasOrientation: hull:Orientation/longitudinal. rel:hasSupportType: hull:SupportType/stringer. hull:span: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:spacing: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:sectionModulusZ: value: 0; unitRef: unit:CM3. hull:shearAreaA: value: 0; unitRef: unit:CM2.

Entity ID: hull:WebFrame1. @type: hull:WebFrames. hull:span: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:sectionModulusZ: value: 0; unitRef: unit:CM3. hull:spacing: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:shearAreaA: value: 0; unitRef: unit:CM2.
Entity ID: hull:Stringers1. @type: hull:Stringers.

Entity ID: hull:IceStringer1. @type: hull:IceStringers. hull:span: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:sectionModulusZ: value: 0; unitRef: unit:CM3. hull:spacing: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:shearAreaA: value: 0; unitRef: unit:CM2.

Entity ID: hull:Bow1. @type: hull:BowStructure. hasComponent: hull:Stem1, hull:ForefootStruct1, hull:BulbousBow1. locatedInHullRegion: Bow. reg:LBOW: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. reg:Awf: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M2. hull:alpha: value: 0; unitRef: unit:DEG. hull:phi1: value: 0; unitRef: unit:DEG. hull:phi2: value: 0; unitRef: unit:DEG. hull:psi: value: 0; unitRef: unit:DEG. hull:stemConstructionType: hull:StemConstructionType/rolled. hull:hasBulbousBow: False.

Entity ID: hull:UpperBowIceBelt1. @type: hull:UpperBowIceBeltRegion. locatedInHullRegion: hull:Region/Bow. hull:verticalExtentTop: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:verticalExtentBottom: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M.
Entity ID: hull:Stem1. @type: hull:Stem.
Entity ID: hull:ForefootStruct1. @type: hull:Forefoot.
Entity ID: hull:BulbousBow1. @type: hull:BulbousBow.

Entity ID: hull:Stern1. @type: hull:SternStructure. hasComponent: hull:SternFrame1, hull:AftDeadwood1, hull:Skeg1, hull:ShaftBossings1. locatedInHullRegion: hull:Region/Stern. hull:sternClearance: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hasClearanceFor: prop:PropulsorSystem1.
Entity ID: hull:SternFrame1. @type: hull:SternFrame.
Entity ID: hull:AftDeadwood1. @type: hull:AftDeadwood.
Entity ID: hull:Skeg1. @type: hull:Skeg.
Entity ID: hull:ShaftBossings1. @type: hull:ShaftBossings.
Entity ID: hull:Superstructure1. @type: hull:Superstructure.
Entity ID: hull:FoundationsAndChocks1. @type: hull:FoundationsAndChocks.
Entity ID: hull:CoatingsAndCathodicProtection1. @type: hull:CoatingsAndCathodicProtection.
Entity ID: hull:Markings1. @type: hull:MarkingsOnStructure. hasComponent: hull:IceClassDraughtMark1.

Entity ID: hull:IceClassDraughtMark1. @type: hull:IceClassDraughtMark. triangleSideLength: value: 300; unitRef: unit:MM. triangleHeight: value: 1000; unitRef: unit:MM. offsetAbaftLoadLine: value: 540; unitRef: unit:MM.
Entity ID: hull:UpperBowIceBelt1. @type: hull:UpperBowIceBeltRegion. locatedInHullRegion: Bow. hull:verticalExtentTop: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M. hull:verticalExtentBottom: value: 0; unitRef: unit:M.
Entity ID: hull:Forefoot1. @type: hull:ForefootRegion. locatedInHullRegion: hull:Region/Bow.

Entity ID: prop:PropulsionSystem1. @type: prop:PropulsionSystem. iceClass: IA. propulsorArrangement: singleScrew. hasEquipment: eng:PrimeMover1, prop:TransmissionSystem1, prop:ShaftingSystem1, prop:ControlAndMonitoringSystem1. hasPropulsor: prop:PropulsorSystem1. hasShaftLine: prop:ShaftingSystem1. hasGearbox: comp:Gearbox1. hasCoupling: comp:Coupling1. hasControlAndMonitoring: prop:ControlAndMonitoringSystem1.

Entity ID: eng:PrimeMover1. @type: eng:PrimeMover. hasEquipment: eng:FuelSystem1, eng:StartingSystem1, eng:CoolingWaterSystem1, eng:LubricatingOilSystem1, eng:IntakeAndExhaustSystem1. isConnectedTo: prop:ShaftingSystem1.
Entity ID: eng:FuelSystem1. @type: eng:FuelSystem.
Entity ID: eng:StartingSystem1. @type: eng:StartingSystem.
Entity ID: eng:CoolingWaterSystem1. @type: eng:CoolingWaterSystem.
Entity ID: eng:LubricatingOilSystem1. @type: eng:LubricatingOilSystem.
Entity ID: eng:IntakeAndExhaustSystem1. @type: eng:IntakeAndExhaustSystem.
Entity ID: prop:TransmissionSystem1. @type: prop:TransmissionSystem. hasComponent: comp:Gearbox1, comp:Coupling1.
Entity ID: comp:Gearbox1. @type: comp:Gearbox.
Entity ID: comp:Coupling1. @type: comp:Coupling.

Entity ID: prop:ShaftingSystem1. @type: prop:ShaftingSystem. hasComponent: comp:IntermediateShaft1, comp:SternTubeAssembly1, comp:ShaftSeals1, comp:BearingsGroup1, comp:ShaftBrakes1, comp:TorsionalVibrationDamper1.
Entity ID: comp:IntermediateShaft1. @type: comp:IntermediateShaft.
Entity ID: comp:SternTubeAssembly1. @type: comp:SternTubeAssembly.
Entity ID: comp:ShaftSeals1. @type: comp:ShaftSeals.
Entity ID: comp:BearingsGroup1. @type: comp:Bearings.
Entity ID: comp:ShaftBrakes1. @type: comp:ShaftBrakes.
Entity ID: comp:TorsionalVibrationDamper1. @type: comp:TorsionalVibrationDamper.
Entity ID: prop:PropulsorSystem1. @type: prop:PropulsorSystem. hasComponent: comp:Propeller1, comp:Nozzle1, comp:HubAndCPMechanism1.
Entity ID: comp:Propeller1. @type: comp:Propeller.
Entity ID: comp:Nozzle1. @type: comp:Nozzle.
Entity ID: comp:HubAndCPMechanism1. @type: comp:HubAndCPMechanism.
Entity ID: prop:ControlAndMonitoringSystem1. @type: prop:ControlAndMonitoringSystem.
Entity ID: prop:ThrusterSystem1. @type: prop:ThrusterSystem. hasComponent: comp:AzimuthingThruster1.
Entity ID: comp:AzimuthingThruster1. @type: comp:AzimuthingThruster.
Entity ID: PropulsionSystem. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Propulsion System. rdfs:comment: Hub linking driver → transmission → shafting; holds arrangement and local ice class for constraints..
Entity ID: hasTransmissionSystem. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PropulsionSystem. rdfs:range: TransmissionSystem.
Entity ID: hasShaftingSystem. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PropulsionSystem. rdfs:range: ShaftingSystem.
Entity ID: hasPropulsor. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PropulsionSystem. rdfs:range: PropulsorSystem.
Entity ID: propulsorArrangement. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PropulsionSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:string.
Entity ID: iceClass. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PropulsionSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:string. rdfs:comment: Mirror ship iceClass here to simplify local SHACL checks from TRAFICOM Ch.6..
Entity ID: PrimeMover. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Prime Mover (Propulsion Engine or Motor). rdfs:comment: Engine/driver interface variables needed for shaft-line design..
Entity ID: mcrPower_kW. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PrimeMover. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: MCR power [kW]..
Entity ID: mcrRpm_revPerSec. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PrimeMover. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: MCR rotational speed [rev/s]..
Entity ID: reversible. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PrimeMover. rdfs:range: xsd:boolean. rdfs:comment: True if reversing required for astern..

Entity ID: qEmax_kNm. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PrimeMover. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Prime mover maximum torque [kNm]. If unknown, default by propulsor type per §6.5.3 Table 6-10..
Entity ID: inertiaRatio_Ie_It. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PrimeMover. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Non-resonant design torque uses Ie/It when applicable (§6.5.3.3)..
Entity ID: isConnectedTo. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PrimeMover. rdfs:range: ShaftingSystem.
Entity ID: hasStartingSystem. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PrimeMover. rdfs:range: StartingSystem. rdfs:comment: TRAFICOM §7.1 starting requirements..
Entity ID: hasCoolingSystem. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PrimeMover. rdfs:range: CoolingWaterInletChest. rdfs:comment: TRAFICOM §7.2 sea inlet and cooling water..
Entity ID: TransmissionSystem. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Transmission System.
Entity ID: Gearbox. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Reduction Gearbox.
Entity ID: hasGearbox. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: TransmissionSystem. rdfs:range: Gearbox.
Entity ID: gearRatio. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Gearbox. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal.
Entity ID: torsionalStiffness_kNmPerRad. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Gearbox. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal.
Entity ID: ratedTorque_kNm. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Gearbox. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal.
Entity ID: efficiency. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Gearbox. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal.
Entity ID: Coupling. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Shaft Coupling.
Entity ID: hasCoupling. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: TransmissionSystem. rdfs:range: Coupling.
Entity ID: couplingType. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Coupling. rdfs:range: xsd:string.
Entity ID: maxMisalignment_mrad. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Coupling. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal.
Entity ID: torsionalStiffness_kNmPerRad. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Coupling. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal.
Entity ID: ratedTorque_kNm. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Coupling. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal.
Entity ID: ShaftingSystem. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Shafting System. rdfs:comment: Holds response torques, thrust, resonance flag, analysis method, and safety factors per §6.6.4..
Entity ID: Qr_kNm. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: ShaftingSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Design response torque [kNm]; used in §6.5.3/.4 checks..
Entity ID: Tr_kN. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: ShaftingSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Design response thrust [kN]..

Entity ID: resonanceWithin20pctOfMaxSpeed. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: ShaftingSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:boolean. rdfs:comment: True if first blade order resonance is within ±20% of max operating speed (bollard) per §6.5.3..
Entity ID: analysisMethod. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: ShaftingSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:string. rdfs:comment: timeDomain|frequencyDomain when resonant per §6.5.3.4..
Entity ID: safetyFactorExtremeYield. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: ShaftingSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: ≥ 1.3 for extreme operational loads per §6.6.4..
Entity ID: safetyFactorFatigue. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: ShaftingSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: ≥ 1.5 for fatigue loads per §6.6.4..
Entity ID: safetyFactorBladeFailureYield. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: ShaftingSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: ≥ 1.0 against yielding under blade failure load per §6.6.4..
Entity ID: StartingSystem. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Starting Air System. rdfs:comment: TRAFICOM §7.1: starts and compressor charging..
Entity ID: airReceiverCapacity_Nm3. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: StartingSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Capacity for ≥12 consecutive starts (reversible) or ≥6 (non-reversible)..
Entity ID: compressorChargeTime_h. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: StartingSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: ≤0.5 h for IASuper reversible; ≤1 h otherwise. See §7.1..
Entity ID: CoolingWaterInletChest. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Cooling Water Inlet Chest. rdfs:comment: TRAFICOM §7.2: chest location/volume/strainer/recirc/headroom..
Entity ID: seaChestVolume_m3. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: CoolingWaterInletChest. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: ≈1 m³ per 750 kW of total engine output..
Entity ID: strainerOpenAreaRatio. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: CoolingWaterInletChest. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Open area ≥ 4× inlet pipe area..
Entity ID: recircDischarge. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: CoolingWaterInletChest. rdfs:range: xsd:boolean. rdfs:comment: Full-capacity discharge recirculation to sea chest present..
Entity ID: nearCenterlineAft. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: CoolingWaterInletChest. rdfs:range: xsd:boolean. rdfs:comment: Sea inlet near centerline and well aft..
Entity ID: iceHeadroom. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: CoolingWaterInletChest. rdfs:range: xsd:boolean. rdfs:comment: Chest height allows ice to accumulate above inlet pipe..
Entity ID: PropulsorSystem. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Propulsor System. rdfs:comment: Umbrella for propeller, nozzle, CP hub, thrusters (§6)..
Entity ID: Propeller. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Propeller. rdfs:comment: Geometry and loads for §6.5 design and fatigue..
Entity ID: Nozzle. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Nozzle. rdfs:comment: Nozzle around propeller (ducted propulsors)..
Entity ID: HubAndCPMechanism. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Hub and CP Mechanism. rdfs:comment: Controllable pitch hub/bolts per blade-failure checks (§6.5.4, §6.6.4)..
Entity ID: ThrusterSystem. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Thruster System. rdfs:comment: Azimuthing/fixed thrusters, body loads & vibration (§6.6.5)..
Entity ID: ThrusterBody. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Thruster Body. rdfs:comment: Body subject to impact/ridge loads (§6.6.5)..
Entity ID: ThrusterMounting. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Thruster Mounting. rdfs:comment: Ship attachment stiffness/damping for global vibration (§6.6.5)..
Entity ID: ThrusterLoadCase. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Thruster Load Case. rdfs:comment: T1–T5 load abstractions for impact/ridge (§6.6.5 Tables 6-16/17)..
Entity ID: RudderAndSteeringSystem. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: Rudder and Steering System. rdfs:comment: Chapter 5 speed & control requirements..
Entity ID: hasPropeller. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PropulsorSystem. rdfs:range: Propeller.
Entity ID: hasNozzle. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PropulsorSystem. rdfs:range: Nozzle.
Entity ID: hasHubMechanism. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PropulsorSystem. rdfs:range: HubAndCPMechanism.
Entity ID: hasThruster. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: PropulsorSystem. rdfs:range: ThrusterSystem.
Entity ID: mountedOn. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: ThrusterSystem. rdfs:range: HullStructureSystem. rdfs:comment: Mounting to stern/hull region..
Entity ID: D_m. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Propeller diameter D [m] (§6.2/6.5)..
Entity ID: P0_7_m. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Pitch at 0.7R [m] (§6.2)..
Entity ID: c0_7_m. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Chord at 0.7R [m] (§6.2)..
Entity ID: EAR. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Expanded area ratio (§6.2)..
Entity ID: hubDiameter_m. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: External hub diameter d [m] (§6.2)..
Entity ID: nn_rpm. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Nominal speed at MCR, free running [rpm] (§6.2)..
Entity ID: n_bollard_rpm. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Speed at MCR bollard [rpm] (§6.5.3.4.1)..
Entity ID: propellerType. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:string. rdfs:comment: open|ducted (§6.5)..
Entity ID: pitchType. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:string. rdfs:comment: FP|CP (§6.2)..
Entity ID: material. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:string. rdfs:comment: Bronze/Austenitic steel/Nodular cast iron… (§6.4.1)..
Entity ID: Z. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:integer. rdfs:comment: Number of blades (§6.2)..
Entity ID: Fb_kN. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Max backward blade force (§6.2, Fig. 6-1)..
Entity ID: Ff_kN. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Max forward blade force (§6.2)..
Entity ID: Qsmax_kNm. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Max spindle torque (§6.5)..
Entity ID: Tb_kN. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Axial force, backward (§6.5)..
Entity ID: Tf_kN. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Axial force, forward (§6.5)..
Entity ID: Qmax_kNm. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Ice torque on propeller (§6.5.3)..
Entity ID: Fex_kN. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Ultimate blade load from plastic bending (§6.2, §6.5.4)..
Entity ID: Qsex_kNm. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Torque from blade failure (§6.5.4)..
Entity ID: SNcurveType. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:string. rdfs:comment: oneSlope|twoSlope (§6.6.2)..
Entity ID: stressRange_MPa. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Fatigue stress range (§6.6.2)..
Entity ID: cycles_N. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:integer. rdfs:comment: Number of cycles used for fatigue check (§6.6.2, NR)..
Entity ID: Nice. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:integer. rdfs:comment: Total number of ice loads on blades (§6.2)..
Entity ID: Nclass. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:integer. rdfs:comment: Reference number per ice class (§6.2)..
Entity ID: boltDesignForFex. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: HubAndCPMechanism. rdfs:range: xsd:boolean. rdfs:comment: CP hub bolts designed for blade-failure load (§6.6.4)..
Entity ID: k1. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Location factor (centre/wing/pulling)..
Entity ID: k2. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Submersion factor = f(h0, Cice, D)..
Entity ID: k3. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Mechanical type factor (e.g., azimuthing)..
Entity ID: Hice_m. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Thickness of design max ice block entering propeller (§6.3, Table 6-3)..
Entity ID: Hiced_m. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: ThrusterSystem. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Design ice thickness for thruster impact (≈2/3 Hice) (§6.2)..
Entity ID: loadedArea_m2. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:decimal. rdfs:comment: Assumed loaded area used in local checks..
Entity ID: loadDistributionType. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:string. rdfs:comment: uniform|triangular|tip (for local pressure distribution)..
Entity ID: methodForQmax. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:string. rdfs:comment: openProp|ductedProp (selects formula set)..
Entity ID: hasAllBladesSimultaneousImpact. @type: rdf:Property. rdfs:domain: Propeller. rdfs:range: xsd:boolean. rdfs:comment: Flag for simultaneous blade impact scenario..

Entity ID: reg:CI_SafetyFactorExtremeYield. @type: ConstraintIntent. hasRegulationClause: reg:6.6.4. targetProperty: prop:safetyFactorExtremeYield. comparisonOperator: >=. requiredValue: 1.3. severity: Violation. message: Extreme load yield factor must be ≥ 1.3 (§6.6.4).. definedByRequirementSet: reg:TRAFICOM_2021. rdfs:seeAlso: reg:CI_SafetyFactorExtremeYield. rdfs:label: Constraint: Safety Factor Extreme Yield.

Entity ID: reg:TRAFICOM_2021. @type: RegulatoryRequirementSet. rdfs:label: TRAFICOM Ice Class Rules (2021). rdfs:comment: Defines regulatory source clauses §5–§8 used in SHACL validation.. definedByRequirementSet: reg:TRAFICOM_2021.

Entity ID: reg:CI_BoltDesignForFex. @type: ConstraintIntent. hasRegulationClause: reg:6.6.4. targetProperty: prop:boltDesignForFex. requiredValue: True. severity: Violation. message: CP hub bolts must be dimensioned for Fex (§6.6.4).. definedByRequirementSet: reg:TRAFICOM_2021. rdfs:seeAlso: reg:CI_SafetyFactorExtremeYield. rdfs:label: Constraint: Safety Factor Extreme Yield.

Entity ID: reg:CI_RudderSpeedMinima. @type: ConstraintIntent. hasRegulationClause: reg:5. targetProperty: prop:rudderDesignSpeed_kn. conditionDescription: IASuper:20, IA:18, IB:16, IC:14 (§5).. severity: Violation. message: Rudder design speed below class minimum.. definedByRequirementSet: reg:TRAFICOM_2021. rdfs:seeAlso: reg:CI_SafetyFactorExtremeYield. rdfs:label: Constraint: Safety Factor Extreme Yield.

Entity ID: reg:CI_MonitoringRequired. @type: ConstraintIntent. hasRegulationClause: reg:8. targetProperty: prop:torsionalVibrationMonitoring. appliesWhen: iceClass >= IA. requiredValue: True. severity: Warning. message: Install torsional vibration monitoring for ice class ≥ IA.. definedByRequirementSet: reg:TRAFICOM_2021. rdfs:seeAlso: reg:CI_SafetyFactorExtremeYield. rdfs:label: Constraint: Safety Factor Extreme Yield.
Entity ID: shape:TRAFICOMPhaseE. @type: shacl:NodeShape. shacl:targetClass: prop:PropulsionSystem. rdfs:comment: Master shape for propulsion-related TRAFICOM checks..
Entity ID: shacl:NodeShape. @type: rdfs:Class. rdfs:label: SHACL Node Shape. rdfs:comment: Generic class for SHACL node shapes used in validation..

Entity ID: shape:safetyFactorExtremeYield. @type: shacl:PropertyShape. shacl:path: prop:safetyFactorExtremeYield. shacl:minInclusive: 1.3. shacl:severity: shacl:Violation. rdfs:comment: §6.6.4 Extreme load yield ≥ 1.3..

Entity ID: shape:boltDesignForFex. @type: shacl:PropertyShape. shacl:path: prop:boltDesignForFex. shacl:hasValue: True. shacl:severity: shacl:Violation. rdfs:comment: §6.6.4 Hub bolts sized for blade failure load..
Entity ID: shape:rudderSpeedMinima. @type: shacl:PropertyShape. shacl:path: prop:rudderDesignSpeed_kn. rdfs:comment: §5 Rudder minima by ice class; map via SHACL SPARQL or JS rule..
